thread.title_full: Firmoo reviewed by Tom치s Gabriel Orbegozo

author: Tom치s Gabriel Orbegozo
title: Tom치s Gabriel Orbegozo
text:
Firmoo it's the best online company that I know so far. I've ordered several times and always the prescription of the glasses was correct. Also, I'm from Argentina and the package was delivered just fine, without any inconvenience.
Finally, it was a great improvement to change the courier to DHL because it accelerated the times of delivery significantly.
